name: The Wandering Heart
description:
Play as Heart, the wandering sorcerer in a world inspired by Howl's Moving Castle.

Uncover the mystery of the missing prince and deal with the Witch of the Red Fields.

This game was submitted for the Metroidvania Month 19 gamejam.

*All assets created by me, Will Mohr*

Controls:

A D to move left and right

Space to jump

E to cast your magic spell
